name: Dot Puzzle Mania 2
description:
Dot Puzzle Mania 2 is a fun, free puzzle game.
Connect 2 dots to create a flow and fill all the board. But watch out, lines will break if they cross or overlap! In some levels, there're tubes that 2 dots can come inside.
features :

- Leaderboard
- 500+ levels
- Ask for help on social media
- Clean, neat and beautiful graphics
- Great sound effects
